body.name: WYZE Cam Pan v2 1080p Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wi-Fi Indoor Smart Home Camera with Color Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Compatible with Alexa & The Google Assistant, White
features: 360° Coverage of Any Room - See the whole room by panning left/right or tilting up/down remotely from your smartphone
Livestream HD Video - Monitor what's going on in and around your home in 1080pHD video and see at night in full color with Starlight Sensor

Automatic Motion Tracking - When enabled, Wyze Cam Pan v2 will automatically track and record motion by rotating the camera, no manual work required, See in the dark - Night vision lets you see up to 30’ in absolute darkness using 6 infrared (IR) LEDs. Note: IR does not work through glass windows.
Two-Way Audio - Hear and speak to anywhere (from anywhere) with perfect clarity, easily used as a baby monitor, nanny cam, or pet camera
Highly Recommended by...Everyone - NYTimes names it, "The Best Pet Camera", CNET rates it 9.2/10, saying "It's the best option for the price."
body.description: Are you ready for the next generation of awesome? Introducing Wyze Cam Pan v2, now with Color Night Vision! Say goodbye to losing sight when something moves outside the view of your camera. With its 110°/sec rotation speed, 360° horizontal range, and 93° vertical range, Wyze Cam Pan v2 delivers 360° coverage in under 3 seconds so you can see exactly what you want to see, when you want to see it. This camera is a favorite for busy households and pet owners.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.4 4.4 out of 5 stars 9,303 ratings 4.4 out of 5 stars

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 360˚ of Coverage See the entire room. Fast.
Smart Assistant Compatible Use your voice to see what’s happening around your home.
Motion Tracking Automatically detect, tag, and track motion in real-time.
Instant Security Alerts Get notified whenever motion is detected. Customize notifications in the Wyze app.
Two-Way Audio Listen and talk to anyone you care about while not at home.
Color Night Vision Capture every story in color, even at night.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works super fine, good image day and night
reviews.reviewText: Definitely value for the money, ease to use and to setup, night vision is ok, you can use a SD Card so you don’t to pay for cloud service if you don’t wantI bought 2 of them and use behind my windows and as long as it clear it will works good.The app to control is good and it has a decent motion detection

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Affordable Camera
reviews.reviewText: I love this camera! I use it in my RV to keep an eye on my dogs while I’m away from the rig. Love how it tracks movement (does a great job at that) and as long as you have a wifi signal, you’ll get a good reliable picture. Also enjoy the 2-way talk feature if I ever need to say something into the camera. It’s also affordable which is an added plus!! Will definitely be buying more from Wyze cameras!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a great buy! It’s durable and we love that we can choose either to install it up on a wall or to place it on a shelf. Also the 360 spin captures everything! Great for parents who work and have older kids can see what your kids are up to and can talk directly to them!! I definitely recommend this set!! I feel more at peace knowing what is going on in my home!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice but not perfect
reviews.reviewText: Nice builtGood horizontal range but needs more vertical flexibility as you need to put in in cumbersome placesIt freezes every 2 or 3 weeks and needs to be restarted. I will need to connect it through a remote switch to do it remotely

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I use this camera to watch and listen to my kids when they go play in the basement.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Everything about this camera is great.... until it stops working (multiple cameras, same result)
reviews.reviewText: This camera has great picture quality, night vision and is really affordable, but unfortunately it's cheap quality and doesn't last more than a few weeks of use. We bought our first one as a pet camera, but after a smooth setup and two weeks of use, the light went red and never reconnected. We reached out to amazon and were sent a replacement. Within a few weeks of having that one set up, it did the same thing. We were made aware on our first replacement that wyze has a warranty guarantee, so instead of reaching out to amazon we figured we'd go straight to wyze. Our first support request went no where, and we missed Amazon's return window during this time, so we just stopped using the camera for a couple months hoping a break and a reset would help bring it back to life. Nope - it never reconnected regardless of trying every troubleshooting method we could find online, and our same issue seems to be common based on what we found researching. We reached out to support again, and this time got a quick response, but weren't offered any assistance in getting our camera back on. Instead, we were given a gift card to buy yet another one directly from them. This would have been fine except it shows the company doesn't even stand by the longevity of their devices. Further, they only reimbursed for the cost of the camera, no tax. Shipping costs $5.99 as well, so we ended up having to pay more $ just to get our replacement camera- regardless of their warranty claims of a guarantee. We needed a camera set up asap, so we ordered, but my expectations are incredibly low that it will actually work, and we plan to replace it with a higher quality camera in the next few months. It's sad because I really was excited about this company and how they were making home security accessible, but this camera in particular is junk and I am disappointed in their handling of our issue.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Camera, Excellent Customer Support
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. There’s a lot to like about this camera. Here are the pros:• Incredibly easy to set up once you have the app• Great image quality• Great night vision quality• Excellent range of motion for panning• Great sound quality, my boyfriend was able to perfectly hear me singing and rapping while he was spying on me• Records event clips when motion is detected, which my boyfriend is extra excited about now that he has a bunch of clips of me singing, rapping, and dancing around while cleaning• Great quality and volume enables me to tell my dog to get off the table or yell at my boyfriend to wake up off the couch and do some laundry or something. No more avoiding my calls or texts on his day off, no mercy!• Great customer support and warranty! When my derpy idiot dog knocked the camera down 4 days after we got it, the image turned magenta. A simple chat with support via the phone app resulted in Wyze Cam sending a new unit, free of charge!Cons:• Does not come with much in the way of instructions• Does not come with any sort of mount or anythingI can’t really say anything bad about this camera so far. We have been very pleased and ended up purchasing other units for various parts of our property to enhance our security.Please enjoy this brief clip of my derpy dog, Demolition Dilly, annihilating the camera.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The Wyze Cam Pan V2 is a great upgrade from the older Pan V1 and definitely coming from older non-Pan V2s. Better image quality, wider field of view, and good panning range.
Great cam for keeping track of our puppy alone in the house! The motion tracking and panning allows us to “search” for her to ensure she’s not up to any mischief.

reviews.reviewTitle: 防犯カメラ性能進化してる。スマホ遠隔操作便利。ｖ２は設定説明は英語だけど気に入っています。
